attributes.action: force Warwickshire Highways department to improve road markings on Rugby's gyratory system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The road markings on the gyratory system, especially by Rugby School and at the Bilton Road/Russelheim Way junction are very unclear and lead to frustration, confusion, near misses, and far from improving traffic flow, actually cause the opposite to happen.  It is clear from letters to the local papers that many drivers are unclear about rights of way within the system, which could be improved if the Highways department repainted the road and put some signs up.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
